name: teleplay
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a play that has been written to be shown on television: Twelve Angry Men began life in 1954 as a 60-minute teleplay, written by Reginald Rose.
the text for a play or drama to be shown on television, including the words to be spoken by the actors and instructions for the cameras: He's one of four writers credited with the teleplay for the brilliant Pine Barrens episode of the Sopranos. Compare
screenplay
